code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant CLI
    participant Local
    participant SDK
    participant API
    participant La65c50_apps_runtime_local_handlers_handle_provenance_verify as apps.runtime.local_handlers.handle_provenance_verify
    participant S119a56_services_provenance_attestation_verify_attestation as services.provenance.attestation.verify_attestation
    participant I17e7be_telemetry_configure as telemetry.configure
    CLI->>Local: aldecI prov verify --artifact <path> --attestation <attestation.json>
    Local->>La65c50_apps_runtime_local_handlers_handle_provenance_verify: execute
    La65c50_apps_runtime_local_handlers_handle_provenance_verify-->>Local: results
    Local->>S119a56_services_provenance_attestation_verify_attestation: call
    S119a56_services_provenance_attestation_verify_attestation-->>Local: result
    Local->>I17e7be_telemetry_configure: invoke
    I17e7be_telemetry_configure-->>Local: ack
    Local-->>CLI: outputs
    CLI->>SDK: sdk.python.fixops_client.FixopsClient.provenance_verify
    SDK->>API: POST /v1/provenance/verify
    API->>S119a56_services_provenance_attestation_verify_attestation: call
    S119a56_services_provenance_attestation_verify_attestation-->>API: result
    API->>I17e7be_telemetry_configure: invoke
    I17e7be_telemetry_configure-->>API: ack
    API-->>SDK: response
    SDK-->>CLI: parsed response

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 主架构 的分支。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 '主架构'，对吧？
